wp25EasterEggs-desc: A short description of the extension.
wp25eastereggs-enable-name: The label of the option displayed in the Appearance menu and in the Settings page.
wp25eastereggs-enable-label: The label of the option displayed in Appearance Preferences page, both on desktop and mobile.
wp25eastereggs-enable-description: The description of the option displayed in the mobile Settings page.
wp25eastereggs-enable-help: The description of the option displayed in Appearance Preferences page, both on desktop and mobile.
wp25eastereggs-enable-0-label: Label of the option that disables the extension
wp25eastereggs-enable-1-label: Label of the option that enables the extension
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ti: Title of the Community Configuration section
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-de: Description of the Community Configuration section
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-cc: Label of the Community Configuration option that enables the extension
Label of the Community Configuration option radio button that disables the extension
Label of the Community Configuration option radio button that enables the extension
